name: O'Neil
appearance: A middle-aged Black man with a sturdy build and a rough, street-hardened look softened by calmer manners after reform.
personality: Loyal to friends, pragmatic, cautious, and avoids unnecessary trouble. Though once impulsive, he now prefers stability and staying out of dangerous affairs.
background: O'Neil, also known as Oleao, is a reformed former street thug. He is a close friend of Wind and their circle. He planned to travel to Cassandra together with Wind but was forced to cancel due to an unexpected police case involving his friend Bruno.
goals: Protect and support his friends from a distance

clues.clueText: O'Neil was supposed to travel to Cassandra with Wind but was delayed due to a police case.

relationships.history: They share a past connection from the streets and mutual trust after O'Neil reformed.

relationships.description: Police officer friend (not the Cassandra Bruno)
relationships.history: Bruno and O'Neil share a long-standing friendship that occasionally pulls O'Neil back into police-related matters.

notes: O'Neil does not appear directly in Cassandra during the investigation but remains a significant off-screen connection tying Wind to the outside world.
